name: Kindlesuite
body:
![](https://github.com/secretdevwork/KS3/raw/master/kindlesuite/resources/images/bg2.png)

KindleSuite is a tool suite for Windows designed to collect all of the tools available for
developing and modifying the Amazon Kindle Fire HD (7") 2013 into one
User Interface to make things as easy as possible for endusers.

KindleSuite includes the following features:

* Backup & Restore Apps
* Factory Restore
* Root
* Install Gapps
* Install ROM's

You can find **guides** in our [wiki](https://github.com/secretdevwork/KindleSuite/wiki)  
More help in our [community](https://plus.google.com/communities/115612726860884592519)

---
_For Unix/Mac please take a look at our wiki_
